/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on both sides. A highway overpass arches over the street, connecting the two sides of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, the tranquil waters of a lake can be seen, providing a stark contrast to the urban environment. The image is a blend of urban development and natural beauty, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing.
